featureType.name: reservoir
featureType.title: reservoir
featureType.nativeCRS: GEOGCS["WGS 84", DATUM["World Geodetic System 1984", SPHEROID["WGS 84", 6378137.0, 298.257223563, AUTHORITY["EPSG","7030"]], AUTHORITY["EPSG","6326"]], PRIMEM["Greenwich", 0.0, AUTHORITY["EPSG","8901"]], UNIT["degree", 0.017453292519943295], AXIS["Geodetic longitude", EAST], AXIS["Geodetic latitude", NORTH], AUTHORITY["EPSG","4326"]]

virtualTable.name: reservoir
virtualTable.sql: SELECT a.reservoir_id as "Reservoir ID" , a.reservoir_type as "Reservoir Type" , a.wss_id as "WSS ID" , b.wss_name as "WSS Name" , a.construction_year as "Construction Year" , a.rehabilitation_year as "Rehabilitation Year" , a.capacity as "Capacity(m3)" , a.material as "Material" , CASE WHEN a.water_meter = true THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END as "Meter Installation" , a.meter_installation_date as "Meter Installation Date" , a.status , a.observation as "Observation" , a.input_date as "Inputted Date" , a.geom , a.elevation as "Elevation" , CASE WHEN a.is_breakpressure = true THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END as "for Breakpressure" ,CASE WHEN a.chlorination_unit = true THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END as "Installation of Chlorination Unit" FROM reservoir a INNER JOIN wss b ON a.wss_id = b.wss_id
